price: ای پلار جانه! د شیطان عبادت مه کوه؛ بې شکه شیطان د رحمن ذات نافرمانه دی.
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yāabati lā taʿbudi al-shayṭāna inna al-shayṭāna kāna lilrraḥmāni ʿaṣiyyan
